description:
The Story:
A successful pastry chef, you've put love on the backburner for one too many years. But a run-in with an ex and the serendipitous appearance of five younger men have put the light of love back into your life!

Characters:
Aki Fujishima     "Wolf in Sheep's Clothing"
Shuichiro Momoi    "Confident and Conceited"
Sosuke Kikuchi         "Cool and Earnest"
Kazuki Serizawa      "Sophisticated & Silver-Tongued Ex"
Kanata Tachibana   "The Loveless Romance Novelist"

Contents:
Includes Main Stories from the app Love 365: Find Your Story up until "The Family Album"
name: Finally, in Love Again
